mapper.select: select b.b_id, b.publish_date, b.user_id, payway.p_name, sum(product.product_price * p.amount) as totalPrice from purchaseList p, product, bill b, payway where b.b_id = p.b_id and product.product_id = p.product_id and payway.p_id = b.p_id and b.user_id = #{user_id} and date(b.publish_date) >= date(subdate(curDate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)) group by p.b_id;

select product.product_name, p.amount, product.product_price * amount as price from purchaseList p, product, bill b where product.product_id = p.product_id and b.b_id = p.b_id and p.b_id = 1 group by p.b_id, product.product_name;
